${ModID}:ReapingSlash.NAME: Reaping Slash
${ModID}:ReapingSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !D! ${ModID}:Reap to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:BladeSpin.NAME: Blade Spin
${ModID}:BladeSpin.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:DemonArmor.NAME: Demon Armor
${ModID}:DemonArmor.DESCRIPTION: When you end your turn with unused [E] , gain !M! Block per unused [E] .

${ModID}:PrepareTheKill.NAME: Prepare The Kill
${ModID}:PrepareTheKill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of your turn lose !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Distract.NAME: Distract
${ModID}:Distract.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Reduce the cost of a random card in your draw pile to 0 until played.

${ModID}:Gank.NAME: Gank
${ModID}:Gank.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you've played 5 or more cards this turn, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:Preparation.NAME: Preparation
${ModID}:Preparation.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Choose a card in your draw pile and give it Retain. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:UmbralTrespass.NAME: Umbral Trespass
${ModID}:UmbralTrespass.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Next turn, deal !${ModID}:m2! damage. Exhaust{!Upgrades!|>0=ive !stslib:ex!}.

${ModID}:StrategicManeuver.NAME: Strategic Maneuver
${ModID}:StrategicManeuver.DESCRIPTION: Select 5 cards from your draw pile and place them at the top of the draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GoldAdvantage.NAME: Gold Advantage
${ModID}:GoldAdvantage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs less than it's original price, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:MoltenBlood.NAME: Molten Blood
${ModID}:MoltenBlood.DESCRIPTION: Lose 5 HP. Deal !D! damage. Target loses !M! HP.

${ModID}:HeavyHitter.NAME: Heavy Hitter
${ModID}:HeavyHitter.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play a card that costs 2 or more each turn gain [E] .
${ModID}:HeavyHitter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first time you play a card that costs 2 or more each turn gain [E] [E] .

${ModID}:UmbralEnergy.NAME: Umbral Energy
${ModID}:UmbralEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E] .

${ModID}:BladesReach.NAME: Blade's Reach
${ModID}:BladesReach.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the two frontmost enemies. NL [#38d3f3]Assassin:[] Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL [#9b111e]Rhaast:[] Gain !M! Block

${ModID}:FinishingTouches.NAME: Finishing Touches
${ModID}:FinishingTouches.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Gain [E]  for each attack you've played this turn up to a maximum of !M!  [E] .

${ModID}:SecondStrike.NAME: Second Strike
${ModID}:SecondStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 0 if you played a card costing more than 1 this turn.

${ModID}:SlaughterTheWeak.NAME: Slaughter The Weak
${ModID}:SlaughterTheWeak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If the enemy has less than 50% HP, deal double damage to that enemy.

${ModID}:BloodGambit.NAME: Blood Gambit
${ModID}:BloodGambit.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Gain [E] and draw a card.

${ModID}:Cull.NAME: Cull
${ModID}:Cull.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL ${ModID}:Reaper's Touch.

${ModID}:EdgeOfDeath.NAME: Edge Of Death
${ModID}:EdgeOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Reap. NL Deal damage equal to half the target's reap.

${ModID}:ShadowClone.NAME: Shadow Clone
${ModID}:ShadowClone.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand, Add a copy that costs 0 into your hand. Exhaust.

${ModID}:Exploit.NAME: Exploit
${ModID}:Exploit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this dealt at least !M! damage, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:ShadowSight.NAME: Shadow Sight
${ModID}:ShadowSight.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain [E] . NL You can only play 1 Shadow Sight per turn.

${ModID}:Overpower.NAME: Overpower
${ModID}:Overpower.DESCRIPTION: Deal 8 damage. NL If you played a card costing 2 or more this turn, gain 8 Block.

${ModID}:CalculatedSteps.NAME: Calculated Steps
${ModID}:CalculatedSteps.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL When Retained, lower its cost by 1.

${ModID}:CalculatedStrikes.NAME: Calculated Strikes
${ModID}:CalculatedStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, lower its cost by 1.

${ModID}:Brutalize.NAME: Brutalize
${ModID}:Brutalize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target does not have Vulnerable, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:ShadowAmbush.NAME: Shadow Ambush
${ModID}:ShadowAmbush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has a debuff, deal an additional !M! damage.

${ModID}:DarkinRage.NAME: Darkin Rage
${ModID}:DarkinRage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs 2 or more, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:WhispersOfBlood.NAME: Whispers Of Blood
${ModID}:WhispersOfBlood.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! ${ModID}:Reap to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Stalk.NAME: Stalk
${ModID}:Stalk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional cards.
